sentence.Network_en: I tried to dissemble an interest I didn't feel.
Henry was not slow to dissemble when it served his purposes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在需要时，亨利会毫不迟疑地伪装自己。

sentence.Network_en: By the time boys reach your age they usually have learned to dissemble for rich uncles.
sentence.Network_cn: 象你那样年纪的孩子都会对有钱的舅舅假装亲热.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration (suggested by semblance) of obsolete dissimule, via Old French from Latin dissimulare 'disguise, conceal'

entry.def: When people dissemble, they hide their real intentions or emotions.

example.ex: Henry was not slow to dissemble when it served his purposes.
example.tran: 在需要时，亨利会毫不迟疑地伪装自己。

means.word_mean: 1. make believe with the intent to deceive;

auth_sentence.content: There is no opportunity to cop out or dissemble.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no opportunity to cop out or dissemble.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no opportunity to cop out or dissemble.

auth_sentence.content: So he starts to dissemble his booth.
auth_sentence.res_content: So he starts to dissemble his booth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So he starts to dissemble his booth.

auth_sentence.content: None of them knew how unhappy she was, so she would have either to dissemble or explain.
auth_sentence.res_content: None of them knew how unhappy she was, so she would have either to dissemble or explain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: None of them knew how unhappy she was, so she would have either to dissemble or explain.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 集合, 装配, 集会, 集结, 汇编
stems_affixes.word_buile: assemble[v.集合,召集;装配;收集 v.集合,聚集]+y状态,性质→assembly
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance表名词→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
sembl相类似,一样+ance表名词→相同之处
as不断+sembl相类似,一样+e→不断[走向]同一个地方→召集
dis不+sembl相类似,一样+e→不想同装做相同→掩饰
re再,加强+sembl相类似,一样+e→v.像,类似

sentences.en: I tried to dissemble an interest I didn’t feel.
